annotations.name: Specification
annotations.annotation: For any Peer p, there is a Tracker t, t shall log synchronized with p shall register.
For any Peer p, there is a Tracker t, t shall log synchronized with p shall unregister.
For any Peer p, p shall either register or unregister.

For any Peer p, there is a Tracker t, such that p is registered to t, if t executes broadcast, p shall speak and for all Peer p1, where p1 is registered to t and p1 is different with p, p1 shall not speak.
For any Peer p, p shall either speak or listen.

For any Peer p, there is a Tracker t where p is registered to t, if t executes broadcast, p shall listen or for all Peer p1, such that p1 is registered to t and p1 is different with p, p1 shall listen.
